# Copilot Workspace Setup Instructions

This file tracks the setup progress for your full-stack workspace (FastAPI backend, React frontend).

## Setup Progress Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file in .github directory
- [x] Scaffold backend (FastAPI)
- [x] Scaffold frontend (React)
- [x] Add README.md with setup instructions
- [x] Install required extensions (if any)
- [x] Compile and run both backend and frontend
- [x] Ensure documentation is complete

All setup steps are complete. Backend and frontend servers are running. Documentation is up to date.
